text: Sarah Billmeier is an American para-alpine skier. She represented the United States in alpine skiing at the 1992, 1994, 1998 and 2002 Winter Paralympics. In total she won seven gold medals, five silver medals and one bronze medal. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition
